author: Reuters
title: Britain imposes lockdown to combat spread of coronavirus
description: “From this evening I must give the British people a very simple instruction - you must stay at home,” Johnson said in a televised address
content:
Prime Minister Boris Johnson ordered Britons on March 23 to stay at home to halt the spread of coronavirus, imposing curbs on everyday life without precedent in peacetime.
All but essential shops must close immediately and people should no longer meet family… [+3614 chars]
